name: Curve Stablecoin - crvUSD
description:
Curve Stablecoin (crvUSD) infrastructure enables users to mint crvUSD using a selection of crypto-tokenized collaterals (adding new ones is subject to DAO approval).
crvUSD is designed to provide a more capital-efficient stablecoin mechanism and smoother liquidations, while maintaining a decentralized design which the Curve DAO governs.
